name: Numeric
desc: A type with values that support multiplication.

items.name: associatedtype Magnitude
items.desc: A type that can represent the absolute value of any possible value of the conforming type.

items.name: init?<T>(exactly: T)
items.desc: Creates a new instance from the given integer, if it can be represented exactly.

items.name: static func * (Self, Self) -> Self
items.desc: Multiplies two values and produces their product.

items.name: static func *= (inout Self, Self)
items.desc: Multiplies two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
